full_summary:
# NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT
### [PW-22-01006458](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HN-329-74994)
### **Minimum Procurement Amount: $0**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category:** Goods for Government Sector (GD)
* **Supply Arrangement (SA) Number:** E60HN-16ELEC Category 3.46
* **Notice URL:** None

## TENDER NOTICE DETAILS

* **Notice Title (English):** Notice of Proposed Procurement - Electrical & Electronic Products against Supply Arrangement (SA) #E60HN-16ELEC Category 3.46
* **Notice Title (French):** Avis de projet de marché (APM) - Produits électriques et électroniques contre arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement (AMA) # E60HN-16ELEC categorie 3.46
* **Solicitation Number:** CRC220923
* **Publication Date:** September 8, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 23, 2022, at 14:00:00
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## PRODUCT REQUIREMENTS

The Department of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada is seeking to procure the following goods:

* Signal and Spectrum Analyzer 2 Hz to 67 GHz
* Oven Controlled Crystal Oscillator, precision frequency reference
* Solid state drive, 128 GB, with analyzer firmware

The responsive Supplier already holding a Supply arrangement for the items mentioned from Public Works and Government Services Canada with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award.

## QUERIES AND CONTACT INFORMATION

All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be directed to:

* Contracting Authority: Samantha Amadio
* Email: [Samantha.Amadio@ised-is
